long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
スペースに参加せずにスペースの話の内容を確認できる拡張機能です
参加したいけど自分が参加したのが相手にバレるのが嫌だったり会話の内容をチェックしたりも出来ます

This is an extension that allows you to check the content of a conversation in a space without joining the space.
If you want to join a space but don't want others to know that you have joined, or if you want to check the content of a conversation, you can do that too.
